original_body_lines: Ceylinco Life celebrated its 35th anniversary and 19th year of market leadership with a spectacular annual awards event at which it recognised 259 exceptional performers with generous awards that fittingly rewarded their outstanding contributions to the company’s results in 2022.

Held at the Hilton Colombo, the awards gala and dinner saw the presentation of a total of 350 awards. The highlight of the event, however, was the presentation of company-maintained vehicles to two top achievers R. P. G. De Silva of the Bambalapitiya branch and K. B. A. Thushara of the Kotahena branch.

Ceylinco Life also made history at the event by honouring a record 214 members of its sales force who qualified for the Million Dollar Round Table (MDRT) in 2022, a new achievement for the Company. Moreover, this year’s ‘High Flyer’ award winners were rewarded with accommodation packages at the Hilton Colombo.
